<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Soaring Poppet](/Feats.aspx?ID=3357) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Poppet" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=418" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 65</row>

</column>

---

Your construction has flaps of cloth or wicker that can keep you aloft. You gain a fly Speed of 15 feet.
name: Soaring Poppet
